skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of increasing the duration of a random buff on a random ally by 1 turn.
skills.name: Nature's Cycle
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Heals all allies by 15% of their MAX HP and places a [Shield] buff equal to 15% of their MAX HP on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Overgrowth
skills.books:
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Shield +5%
Level 4: Heal +10%
Level 5: Shield +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Places a [Perfect Veil] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] buff for 2 turns on all allies whose ATK is higher than their DEF. 
 
Places a [Block debuffs] buff for 1 turn and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff for 2 turns and on all allies whose DEF is higher than their ATK.
skills.name: Attunement
